sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from @{item().tablename}
where createddate between '@{activity('last date').output.firstRow.WaterMarkValue}' and '@{activity('Current date').output.firstRow.currenttime}'

select * from data_source_table 
    where LastModifytime between '@{activity('last run').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and '@{activity('currentdate').output.firstRow.currenttime}'

scriptLines: AggregateTransformation derive(CustomerSegment = iif(TotalSpend > 5000, 'High Spender', iif(TotalSpend >= 1000, 'Medium Spender', 'Low Spender'))) ~> CustomerSegment
